1.caption_en:
Caption: Slide describing the shift from isolated industries to interconnected market networks and ecosystems, outlining benefits, challenges, and a domain diagram centered on "Market Ecosystems."

{
  "artifact_type": "presentation_slide",
  "title": "The Shift from Industries to Market Networks & Ecosystems",
  "headline": "The Shift from Industries to Market Networks & Ecosystems",
  "language": "English",
  "summary": "Explains how traditional industry silos are evolving into dynamic, interconnected market networks and ecosystems, discusses customer expectations, collaboration and governance challenges, and the strategic advantages for businesses that participate in ecosystems.",
  "main_points": [
    "Industries are moving from standalone entities to interconnected market networks and ecosystems.",
    "Market networks bring together suppliers, manufacturers, distributors, service providers, and customers to create shared value.",
    "Customers now expect end-to-end, seamless solutions enabled by ecosystem collaboration.",
    "Challenges include balancing competition and collaboration, governance, trust-building, and value-sharing.",
    "Participating in ecosystems expands opportunities, accelerates innovation, and leverages collective intelligence."
  ],
  "diagram": {
    "type": "node_map",
    "center_node": "Market Ecosystems",
    "nodes": [
      "Travel",
      "Commerce",
      "Community & Government",
      "Enterprise Services",
      "Small Enterprise Services",
      "Input Marketplace",
      "Mobility",
      "Health",
      "Wealth & Stability",
      "Talent",
      "Digital Experience",
      "Home"
    ],
    "layout_description": "Central 'Market Ecosystems' node with surrounding domain nodes representing ecosystem sectors."
  },
  "visual_layout": "Two-column text-heavy slide with multi-paragraph left and center text, a right-side boxed summary and a bottom-right diagram illustrating ecosystem domains.",
  "source": "Book \"The Ecosystem Economy\", 2022"
}

2.caption_en:
Caption:
This presentation slide explains the transition from siloed industries to interconnected market networks and ecosystems, emphasizing collaboration, shared value creation, and customer-centric end-to-end solutions. It highlights benefits, governance challenges, and examples of ecosystem domains centered on a "Market Ecosystems" node.

{
  "title": "The Shift from Industries to Market Networks & Ecosystems",
  "type": "presentation slide / informational infographic",
  "language": "English",
  "source": "Book \"The Ecosystem Economy\", 2022 (noted on image)",
  "summary": "Describes how traditional standalone industries are evolving into dynamic, interconnected market networks and ecosystems that enable collaboration, shared value creation, and seamless end-to-end customer solutions, while also presenting governance and coordination challenges.",
  "visual_layout": {
    "title_position": "top-left",
    "text_blocks": [
      {
        "position": "left column",
        "content_role": "introductory and explanatory paragraphs about market networks, customer expectations, and drivers of change"
      },
      {
        "position": "center column",
        "content_role": "challenges, governance, and benefits of participating in ecosystems"
      },
      {
        "position": "right column",
        "content_role": "bolded summary paragraph emphasizing transformation and strategic guidance"
      }
    ],
    "diagram": {
      "position": "bottom-right area",
      "description": "A cluster/box diagram with a central blue 'Market Ecosystems' node surrounded by lighter blue rectangular nodes representing domains and services."
    }
  },
  "diagram_nodes": [
    "Market Ecosystems",
    "Travel",
    "Commerce",
    "Community & Government",
    "Enterprise Services",
    "Small Enterprise Services",
    "Input Marketplace",
    "Home",
    "Digital Experience",
    "Talent",
    "Wealth & Stability",
    "Health",
    "Mobility"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "market networks",
    "ecosystems",
    "collaboration",
    "value creation",
    "customer experience",
    "governance",
    "innovation",
    "interdependence"
  ],
  "colors": [
    "teal / dark teal (title and central node)",
    "light teal / cyan (peripheral nodes)",
    "white (background)",
    "dark gray (body text)"
  ],
  "contains_diagram": true,
  "notes": "Slide emphasizes shift in business models and lists ecosystem domains; exact typography and dimensions not specified."
}
